description: This script uses AI model to act as a "Pickup Code Assistant", which parses information through screenshots or photos, and then displays the code on the "Live Activities"
name: Pickup Code Assistant

localizedDescriptions.en: This script uses AI model to act as a "Pickup Code Assistant", which parses information through screenshots or photos, and then displays the code on the "Live Activities"
localizedDescriptions.zh: 脚本使用大模型来充当【取码器小助手】，通过截图或照片来解析取餐信息，再通过【实时活动常】驻来展示取餐码
